name: GroupSessionEvent
desc: A session-related event that appears in the system UI.

items.name: init(originator: Participant, action: GroupSessionEvent.Action, url: URL?)
items.desc: Creates a new event with the specified participant and action details.

items.name: let originator: Participant
items.desc: The participant that initiated the event.

items.name: let url: URL?
items.desc: The URL to open when the participant taps the event link in the system UI.

items.name: struct Action
items.desc: A playback-related change that occurs during the session.
